title: Any video that tells us how to make Wudu according to the Sunnah? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: M says can you tell us how to perform W according to the sun this would take a lot of time M there are many many videos on YouTube that you can follow uh I think she Muhammad Salah uh Dr Muhammad Salah has done one um I I believe that many trusted Scholars have done so you can go through it you can go through Islam q&a. info they will give you the precise Hadith authentic Hadith of the description that would tell you how to do it e
